sqlMap.insert:
select case when max(bbs_id) is null then 1 else max(bbs_id)+1 end from tbbs_board where mail_domain_seq = #mailDomainSeq#
insert into tbbs_board ( bbs_id, mail_domain_seq, mail_user_seq, bbs_type, bbs_name, read_auth, write_auth, page_per_cnt, att_max_cnt, att_max_size, aging_day, creator_seq, create_time, description ) values ( #bbsId#, #mailDomainSeq#, #mailUserSeq#, #bbsType#, #bbsName#, #readAuth#, #writeAuth#, #pagePerCnt#, #attMaxCnt#, #attMaxSize#, #agingDay#, #creatorSeq#, #createTime#, #description# )

select case when max(content_id) is null then 1 else max(content_id)+1 end from tbbs_content where bbs_id = #bbsId# and mail_domain_seq = #mailDomainSeq#
insert into tbbs_content ( bbs_id, mail_domain_seq, is_notice, content_id, parent_id, depth, order_no, subject, att_cnt, ref_cnt, content, creator_seq, creator_name, create_time, ip, msg_id, content_type ) values ( #bbsId#, #mailDomainSeq#, #isNotice#, #contentId#,
#parentId#
#contentId#
, #depth#, #orderNo#, #subject#, #attCnt#, #refCnt#, #content#, #creatorSeq#, #creatorName#, #createTime#, #ip#, #msgId#, #contentType# )
insert into tbbs_attach ( bbs_id, mail_domain_seq, content_id, att_path, att_name, att_size ) values ( #bbsId#, #mailDomainSeq#, #contentId#, #attPath#, #attName#, #attSize# )
sqlMap.update:
update tbbs_board
bbs_name = #bbsName:VARCHAR#
read_auth = #readAuth:VARCHAR#
write_auth = #writeAuth:VARCHAR#
page_per_cnt = #pagePerCnt:NUMBER#
att_max_cnt = #attMaxCnt:NUMBER#
att_max_size = #attMaxSize:NUMBER#
aging_day = #agingDay:NUMBER#
description = #description:VARCHAR#
WHERE bbs_id = #bbsId# and mail_domain_seq = #mailDomainSeq#

update tbbs_content
is_notice = #isNotice:NUMBER#
subject = #subject:VARCHAR#
att_cnt = #attCnt:NUMBER#
content = #content:BLOB#
creator_seq = #creatorSeq:NUMBER#
create_time = #createTime:VARCHAR#
ip = #ip:VARCHAR#
msg_id = #msgId:VARCHAR#
content_type = #contentType:VARCHAR#
WHERE content_id = #contentId# and bbs_id = #bbsId# and mail_domain_seq = #mailDomainSeq#
update tbbs_content set ref_cnt=ref_cnt+1 where bbs_id=#bbsId# and content_id=#contentId# and mail_domain_seq = #mailDomainSeq#
update tbbs_content set att_cnt = #attCnt# where bbs_id=#bbsId# and content_id=#contentId# and mail_domain_seq = #mailDomainSeq#
update tbbs_content set order_no=order_no+1 where bbs_id=#bbsId# and parent_id=#parentId# and mail_domain_seq = #mailDomainSeq# and order_no > #orderNo#
sqlMap.delete: delete from tbbs_board where bbs_id = #bbsId# and mail_domain_seq = #domainSeq#

delete from tbbs_content where bbs_id = #bbsId# and mail_domain_seq = #mailDomainSeq#
#contentIds[]#

delete from tbbs_attach where bbs_id = #bbsId# and mail_domain_seq = #mailDomainSeq#
#contentIds[]#
sqlMap.select: select * from tbbs_board where mail_domain_seq = #domainSeq# and (bbs_type is null or bbs_type not in ('notice')) order by bbs_topid, bbs_fullid
select * from tbbs_board where bbs_id = #bbsId# and mail_domain_seq = #domainSeq# and (bbs_type is null or bbs_type not in ('notice'))
select * from tbbs_board where bbs_id = #bbsId# and mail_domain_seq = #domainSeq#
select count(*) from tbbs_content where bbs_id = #bbsId# and mail_domain_seq = #mailDomainSeq#
select * from tbbs_content where bbs_id = #bbsId# and content_id = #contentId# and mail_domain_seq = #mailDomainSeq#
select * from tbbs_content where bbs_id = #bbsId# and mail_domain_seq = #mailDomainSeq# and is_notice = 1 order by content_id desc
select count(*) from tbbs_content where bbs_id = #bbsId# and mail_domain_seq = #mailDomainSeq# and is_notice = 1

select * from tbbs_content where bbs_id= #bbsId# and mail_domain_seq = #mailDomainSeq#
creator_seq = #creatorSeq#
subject like #keyWord#
creator_name like #keyWord#
content like #keyWord#
(subject like #keyWord# or creator_name like #keyWord#)
(subject like #keyWord# or content like #keyWord#)
(subject like #keyWord# or creator_name like #keyWord# or content like #keyWord#)
creator_seq = #keyWord#
order by parent_id desc, order_no
limit #skipResult#, #maxResult#

select count(*) from tbbs_content where bbs_id= #bbsId# and mail_domain_seq = #mailDomainSeq#
creator_seq = #creatorSeq#

#messageIds[]#

select mail_user_seq from tbbs_admin where bbs_id = #bbsId# and mail_domain_seq = #mailDomainSeq#
select case when max(order_no) is null then 0 else max(order_no) end from tbbs_content where bbs_id = #bbsId# and parent_id = #parentId# and mail_domain_seq = #mailDomainSeq#

select * from tbbs_content where bbs_id=#bbsId# and mail_domain_seq = #mailDomainSeq#
creator_seq = #creatorSeq#
subject like #keyWord#
creator_name like #keyWord#
content like #keyWord#
(subject like #keyWord# or creator_name like #keyWord#)
(subject like #keyWord# or content like #keyWord#)
(subject like #keyWord# or creator_name like #keyWord# or content like #keyWord#)
creator_name = #keyWord#
and content_id not in (#contentId#, #parentId#) and parent_id <= #parentId#
parent_id = #parentId# and order_no > #orderNo#
order by parent_id desc, order_no
limit 0, 1

sqlMap.insert:
select case when max(reply_id) is null then 1 else max(reply_id)+1 end from tbbs_content_reply where bbs_id=#bbsId# and content_id = #contentId# and mail_domain_seq = #mailDomainSeq#
insert into tbbs_content_reply ( bbs_id, mail_domain_seq, content_id, reply_id, content, creator_seq, creator_name, create_time, ip ) values ( #bbsId#, #mailDomainSeq#, #contentId#, #replyId#, #content#, #creatorSeq#, #creatorName#, #createTime#, #ip# )
sqlMap.delete: delete from tbbs_content_reply where reply_id=#replyId# and bbs_id=#bbsId# and content_id = #contentId# and mail_domain_seq = #mailDomainSeq#
sqlMap.select: select count(*) from tbbs_content where bbs_id=#bbsId# and mail_domain_seq = #doaminSeq# and create_time like #today#
